document_data.caption: The ruins of Waukeen Way as of 1479 DR.
document_data.name: Waukeen Way
document_data.text: Some of our Neverwinter Guard patrols have gone missing while exploring Waukeen Way...
document_data.mainbody: By the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the area came to be occupied by the [[Many-Arrows]] [[orc]]s, who clashed with the [[Neverwinter Guard]] over control of the Tower District. Neverwintan troops had to be particularly careful of being captured and tortured while on patrol on Waukeen Way.
document_data.Geography: Waukeen Way was located in Neverwinter's [[Tower District]]. It was south of the [[Fallen Tower]].
